headline: LKQ Corporation (LKQ): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on LKQ Corporation on Show me the incentives…’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LKQ. LKQ Corporation’s share was trading at $33.29 as of February 23rd. LKQ’s trailing and forward P/E were 11.43 and 9.33 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. LKQ Corporation is a global distributor of aftermarket vehicle parts and diagnostic services that has historically grown through acquisitions to become the leading player across North Americ
